text: Wayne Alan Northrop (April 12, 1947 â€“ November 29, 2024) was an American actor. His career began in 1981. He was known for his roles in soap operas such as Michael Culhane in Dynasty and Roman Brady in Days of Our Lives. Northrop was born in Sumner, Washington. Northrop died from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease at a retirement home in Los Angeles, California on November 29, 2024, at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Washington (state) Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Wayne Northrop
